text.jpText: ア？　小腹が空いたからメシだよ、メシ。
text.enText: Aah? I'm hungry, so it's meh, meh.

text.jpText:
ちゃんとした食事をしろって顔してっけど、
サプリやシリアルで済ませたほうが、
明らかに効率的だろ。
text.enText:
You look like you want me to eat right, but 
you'd obviously be more efficient if you ate 
supplements or cereal. It's obviously more 
efficient to eat supplements and cereals.

text.jpText:
栄養を摂取できりゃ、何食っても同じ。
もちろん美味いにこしたことねェが、
オレにとって重要なのはそこじゃ――
text.enText:
It doesn't matter what you eat as long as you 
get your nutrients. Of course it has to taste 
good. But that's not what's important to me.

text.jpText:
……やめだ。
ベラベラ語り過ぎた……クソッ。
text.enText:
I'm…… quitting. I've been 
blabbing too much.…… Damn.
